name: Invaders (itch) (Fernando Aires Castello)
description:
Army of alien invaders from outerspace are trying to invade.

Mission: destroy invaders, before they invade.

(Note: they will inevitably invade but you must get the highest score so you can brag about it in the afterlife)

Controls:

  • Left/right arrow key = maneuver spaceship
  • Space key = shoot missile
  • Up arrow key = turbo speed boost
  • Pause/break key = exit game
